description: Construction of an approximately 572 m2 forensic identification office and laboratory in Port Moody, BC.
full_summary:
Auction Title: North Fraser Forensic Information Service Tenant Improvement
================================ानसभnictarn fluoride solute Satoshi致929 

**English**
------------------
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids for the construction of a forensic information service tenant improvement project, located in Port Moody, British Columbia. 

### Auction Details

* Reference Number: PW-22-01011452
* Solicitation Number: M298920124
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: 2022-10-26
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-11-10 T17:00 Hours
* Amendment Date: 2022-11- 4

### Project Description

The RCMP requires construction services from a qualified bidder for a 572m² forensic identification office and laboratory for the North Fraser Forensic Information Service in Port Moody, BC. The contract period is six months from the date of contract, with a start date anticipated as soon as possible.

### Security Requirements

Security cleared personnel, specifically architects, Design Leads, and Project Managers, are required to hold Enhanced Reliability Status (ERS) at vetting by the Royal Canadian Mounted Police's Personnel Security Unit.

### Procurement Process

This is a two-phase selection process. Qualified bidders will be invited to Phase Two. The lowest bid will be awarded the contract. 

### Contact Information

* Contact name: Amy Wang
* Email: amy.wang@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: (236) 330-3559

### Attachment

Refer to the attached tender documents for further information. [link]
